Sentencas: The electrochemical behaviour of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) fed with n-dodecane reformate is investigated.
Titulo: Study of a solid oxide fuel cell fed with n-dodecane reformate. Part II: Effect of the reformate composition

Sentencas: Experiments are carried out at 800 degrees C by using a cell consisting of a supporting Ni anode, a thin double layer yttria-stabilised zirconia/yttria-doped ceria electrolyte and a perovskite cathode.
Titulo: Study of a solid oxide fuel cell fed with n-dodecane reformate. Part II: Effect of the reformate composition

Sentencas: A catalytic steam reformer (SR) is used for processing the n-dodecane at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Study of a solid oxide fuel cell fed with n-dodecane reformate. Part II: Effect of the reformate composition

Sentencas: The reformer is operated with a steam to carbon (S/C) ratio varying progressively from 3 to 1 and a gas space velocity (GHSV) equal to 16,000h(-1), in the presence of a Rh-CeO2-ZrO2 catalyst.
Titulo: Study of a solid oxide fuel cell fed with n-dodecane reformate. Part II: Effect of the reformate composition

Sentencas: The composition of the reformate gas is determined by gas-chromatography before feeding the stream to the SOFC cell.
Titulo: Study of a solid oxide fuel cell fed with n-dodecane reformate. Part II: Effect of the reformate composition

Sentencas: An endurance test of 300 h for the coupled reformer-SOFC system shows a good stability using a range of S/C values from 3 to 1.5.
Titulo: Study of a solid oxide fuel cell fed with n-dodecane reformate. Part II: Effect of the reformate composition

Sentencas: Electrochemical ac-impedance spectra (EIS) and polarizations curves are carried out during the durability test to study the cell ageing.
Titulo: Study of a solid oxide fuel cell fed with n-dodecane reformate. Part II: Effect of the reformate composition

Sentencas: By decreasing the S/C to 1, an occlusion of the reforming reactor, as a consequence of n-dodecane cracking, occurs.
Titulo: Study of a solid oxide fuel cell fed with n-dodecane reformate. Part II: Effect of the reformate composition

Sentencas: Post-operation scanning electron microscopy analysis (SEM) of the SOFC cell shows that the Ni-based anode is not affected by any relevant deposition of carbon fibres including the inner pores.
Titulo: Study of a solid oxide fuel cell fed with n-dodecane reformate. Part II: Effect of the reformate composition

Sentencas: Whereas, the cracking process, occurring at low S/C values, is essentially involving the catalytic bed and the anode feed pipeline.
Titulo: Study of a solid oxide fuel cell fed with n-dodecane reformate. Part II: Effect of the reformate composition

Sentencas: However, the occurrence of high molecular weight hydrocarbons, already at S/C 1.5, causes a decrease of the cell performance.
Titulo: Study of a solid oxide fuel cell fed with n-dodecane reformate. Part II: Effect of the reformate composition

Sentencas: Accordingly, the best trade-off is achieved with S/C = 2.
Titulo: Study of a solid oxide fuel cell fed with n-dodecane reformate. Part II: Effect of the reformate composition
